reviewText: I recommend this game to anyone who likes strategy games. This game had four modes of game which give you more hours of gameplay.
This game is showing two things (or just one, who cares): Tetris is immortal AND it could be inspiration for something fresh and unique. If you like logical game with simple rules, buy it.
Very relaxing game. Good to chill out after a long, hard day.
Product received for free\n\nQuite complicated at the beginning, but I enjoy it so far.
